- tried to launch it... NPE occurs

Created an attachment (id=38445)
patch to check for null

Problem seems to be in finding the output folder of a project in the workspace.  For whatever reason, it is not finding the output folder.  This patch checks to see if the folder is not found.
are you checking for a Java nature on the project before you reach for an output folder?

Deleted some projects from the Workspace and ones on the file system that were not in the workspace but in the same folder on disk and while deleting I tried to open the launch dialog and got the following NPE

I think it is interesting to note that I can run the same launch config on N20060411-0010.

Created an attachment (id=38467)
fix

The problem came when the output folder for a project was the projects root directory.  Changed the way I got the IPath from the IResource.  

Unfortunately, the stack trace in comment 3 looks to be a different problem.  We might have to open up another bug report for that one.

Thanks Michael for your help in tracing down this problem.
